original_text: And Moses said, “Today you have been ordained for the service of the Lord, each one at the cost of his son and of his brother, so that he might bestow a blessing upon you this day.”
korean_text: 모세가 이르되 각 사람이 자기의 아들과 자기의 형제를 쳤으니 오늘 여호와께 헌신하게 되었느니라 그가 오늘 너희에게 복을 내리시리라

sentences.original_text: “Today you have been ordained for the service of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 너희는 주를 섬기는 일을 위해 구별되었으니,

sentences.original_text: each one at the cost of his son and of his brother,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 각자가 자기 아들과 형제의 대가로,

sentences.original_text: so that he might bestow a blessing upon you this day.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 오늘 너희에게 복을 내리게 하려 함이라.”
